name: Don't Hug Me I'm Scared: Death Experience
name_original: Don't Hug Me I'm Scared: Death Experience
description:
As far back as I can remember, I always knew I deserved to be dead!

Ever wanted to know what's its like to be dead? Then this is the game for you! The five buttons have different conversations! This game uses audio and photos from the Don't Hug Me I'm Scared episode "Death".
